# SiteSync V3

> AI-Native Building Services Operating System. Buildings own their service history permanently. Workers build portable reputations. AI assists invisibly. Version 3.0.0 | December 2025

## Quick Start (Read First)

- [CLAUDE.md](CLAUDE.md): Concise project context (~70 lines, 800 tokens)
- [AI Context](AI_CONTEXT.md): Essential AI context (~220 lines, 2500 tokens)
- [Glossary](docs/GLOSSARY.md): Consistent terminology (~350 lines, 3000 tokens)
- [Complete Reference](CLAUDE_CODE_GUIDE.md): Full technical reference (~1450 lines, 15000 tokens)

Machine-readable manifest: [.llm-manifest.json](.llm-manifest.json)
Full documentation dump: [llms-full.txt](llms-full.txt)

## Core Documentation

- [Data Model](docs/reference/data-model.md): Database schemas, SQL, Pydantic models (~12000 tokens)
- [Triforce AI](docs/explanation/triforce-ai.md): Multi-model AI architecture (~10000 tokens)
- [API Reference](docs/reference/api.md): REST API endpoints (~9000 tokens)
- [Architecture](docs/reference/architecture.md): System design (~4000 tokens)
- [Enums](docs/reference/enums.md): Status codes and constants (~2500 tokens)

## Key Terminology

| Term | Definition |
|------|------------|
| Organization | Multi-tenant root entity (a company) |
| Site | A building or location |
| Elevator | Equipment asset (lift) |
| Work Order | A job/task to perform |
| Contractor | Service provider |
| Triforce AI | Multi-model consensus system |

## Technology Stack

- Database: PostgreSQL 16+ with RLS, pgvector
- Backend: FastAPI, Python 3.12+
- Frontend: React 18, TypeScript, TanStack Query
- AI: Triforce (Gemini + Claude + GPT-4), Pydantic AI
- Infrastructure: GCP Cloud Run

## Total Documentation

~116,000 tokens across 31 documents. See llms-full.txt for complete dump.
